boofcv.alg.feature.detect.grid
Interface RefineCalibrationGridCorner

All Known Implementing Classes:
WrapRefineCornerCanny, WrapRefineCornerSegmentFit
public interface RefineCalibrationGridCorner

Interface for computing sub-pixel accurate corners given a set of corners with are within a few pixels of the true corners

Author:
Peter Abeles

Method Summary
 void refine(java.util.List<QuadBlob> squares, ImageFloat32 image)
          Refines the initial corner estimates in the blobs with a sub-pixel estimate.
 

Method Detail

refine

void refine(java.util.List<QuadBlob> squares,
            ImageFloat32 image)
Refines the initial corner estimates in the blobs with a sub-pixel estimate. The sub-pixel estimates are stored in each QuadBlob.

Parameters:
squares - List of square blobs whose corner estimates need to be refined. Modified
image - Original image being processed.
